title: SMOKERS' REQUISITES; MATCH BOXES; SIMULATED SMOKING DEVICES  (inhaling appliances for medical purposes, shaped like cigars, cigarettes or pipes A61M15/06)
definition_statement: This place covers: Smokers' requisites: Pipes, Appliances for smoking cigars or cigarettes, Receptacles for cigars or cigarettes, Receptacles for cigarette papers, Ashtrays, Match receptacles or boxes, Simulated smoking devices.

title: Tobacco pipes
informative_references: Bowls for pipes per seBeekeepers' pipes
definition_statement: This place covers: Tobacco pipes, Hookahs.

title: Hookahs
special_rules: This group also includes accessories for Hookahs.

title: Tobacco pipes combined with other objects  (smoking appliances on walking sticks or canes A45B3/16)
informative_references: Smoking appliances on walking sticks or canes
definition_statement: This place covers: Tobacco pipes combined with other objects, e.g. with cleaning appliances.

title: Bowls for pipes
definition_statement: This place covers: Bowls for pipes per se, features thereof.

title: Mouthpieces for pipes; Mouthpieces for cigar or cigarette holders
definition_statement: This place covers: Mouthpieces both for pipes and cigarette holders.

title: Accessories for smokers' pipes
definition_statement: This place covers: Accessories for smokers' pipes, e.g. tobacco stoppers or cleaning devices per se.

title: Tobacco stoppers, i.e. devices for tamping tobacco down into the pipe  (combined with tobacco cases A24F23/04)
Cleaning devices for pipes  (combined with pipes A24F3/02)
Seasoning of tobacco pipes
definition_statement: This place covers: Devices or method for smoking a pipe the first time or conditioning it again after a long period of non-use

title: Appliances for smoking cigars or cigarettes
special_rules: Apparatus for filtering the whole smoke of cigarette, also the smoke exhaled from the smoker, should be classified in this main group.
definition_statement: This place covers: Appliances useful during the smoking experience

title: with arrangements for cleaning or cooling the smoke
Extinguishers for cigars or cigarettes
definition_statement: This place covers: Extinguishers per se.

title: Receptacles or boxes specially adapted for cigars, cigarettes, simulated smoking devices or cigarettes therefor  (adaptations for use in vehicles B60N3/12; packages specially adapted for cigarettes B65D85/10)
definition_statement: This place covers: Receptacles for cigars or cigarettes, Receptacles for cigarette packages.

title: {with means for limiting the frequency of smoking, e.g. with time-control, counting means}
informative_references: Mechanically actuated apparatus for measuring-off predetermined time intervals in generalElectronic means

title: for domestic use {(A24F15/005 takes precedence)}
with means for offering  (A24F15/04 takes precedence)
for pocket use {(A24F15/005 takes precedence)}
with separate compartments for each cigar or cigarette {(A24F15/005 takes precedence)}
Receptacles for cigarette papers
definition_statement: This place covers: Protective cases for cigarette papers booklets

title: Ash-trays  (arrangements in vehicle passenger accommodation B60N3/08)
definition_statement: This place covers: Ashtrays in any form.

title: {Stands for ashtrays}
special_rules: Outdoor ashtrays are usually classified here.

title: Stands for smokers' requisites
definition_statement: This place covers: Holders or containers or supports for smokers' requisites.

title: Cases for tobacco, snuff, or chewing tobacco
definition_statement: This place covers: Cases or containers specially for tobacco, snuff or chewing tobacco.

title: Devices used by the smoker for controlling the moisture content of, or for scenting, cigars, cigarettes or tobacco
informative_references: Humidifying tobacco in the factory is classified in
definition_statement: This place covers: Cigar, cigarette or tobacco humidors.

title: Match receptacles or boxes  (composition of strike-surfaces, matches C06F)
definition_statement: This place covers: Any kind of receptacles for matches.

title: Stands for match-boxes
informative_references: Receptacles for matches or match-boxes to be supported on the wall

title: Match dispensers; Dispensers for matches arranged on strips
Devices for igniting matches; Holders for ignited matches
definition_statement: This place covers: Devices for the (automatic) ignition of matches while they are taken off from the package, Striking surfaces for matches, Holders for ignited matches.

title: Pipe-spills; Devices for splitting matches
definition_statement: This place covers: Holders for spills, tapers or spent matches.

title: Smokers' requisites not otherwise provided for
definition_statement: This place covers: Smokers' requisites which cannot be classified elsewhere Devices for assisting in stopping or limiting smoking.
